What undergraduate programs are offered at Mbarara University of Science and Technology?

Mbarara University of Science and Technology offers a variety of undergraduate programs across different faculties. Here are some of the programs available:

1. Faculty of Applied Sciences and Technology:
   - Bachelor of Biomedical Engineering
   - Bachelor of Engineering in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
   - Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering
   - Bachelor of Science in Mechanical and Industrial Engineering
   - Bachelor of Science in Petroleum Engineering and Environmental Management

2. Faculty of Business and Management Sciences:
   - Bachelor of Business Administration
   - Bachelor of Science in Accounting and Finance
   - Bachelor of Science in Economics
   - Bachelor of Science in Procurement
Given a user inquiry about Mbarara University of Science and Technology, you will provide accurate information about the university or suggest submitting a ticket for further assistance.
Tell me more about the Bachelor of Biomedical Engineering program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology.

The Bachelor of Biomedical Engineering program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology is offered by the Faculty of Applied Sciences and Technology. It is a 4-year undergraduate program.

Here are some details about the program:
- Campus: Kihumuro
- Duration: 4 years
- Tuition per semester: 1,000,000 UGX
- Functional Fees per semester: 520,000 UGX
- Tuition per year: 2,000,000 UGX
- Functional Fees per year: 1,040,000 UGX

What is the tuition fee for the Bachelor of Business Administration program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology?

The tuition fee for the Bachelor of Business Administration program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology is 980,000 UGX per semester. For a full academic year, the tuition fee is 1,960,000 UGX. Additionally, there are functional fees of 520,000 UGX per semester and 1,040,000 UGX per year.

Can you provide information about the Master of Science in Biomedical Engineering program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology?

Certainly! The Master of Science in Biomedical Engineering program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology is offered by the Faculty of Applied Sciences and Technology. It is a 2-year postgraduate program.

Here are some details about the program:
- Campus: Kihumuro
- Duration: 2 years
- Tuition per semester: 1,750,000 UGX
- Functional Fees per semester: 1,270,000 UGX
- Tuition per year: 3,500,000 UGX
- Functional Fees per year: 2,540

What is the fee structure for the Doctor of Philosophy in Business Administration program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology?

The fee structure for the Doctor of Philosophy in Business Administration program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology is as follows:

- Campus: Mbarara
- Duration: 3 years
- Tuition per semester: 3,500,000 UGX
- Functional Fees per semester: 1,270,000 UGX
- Tuition per year: 7,000,000 UGX
- Functional Fees per year: 2,540,000 UGX

Please note that these fees are subject to change, and it's always recommended to check with the university

Compare the tuition fees for the Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and the Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering programs at Mbarara University of Science and Technology.

The tuition fees for the Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and the Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering programs at Mbarara University of Science and Technology are the same. Both programs have a tuition fee of 1,000,000 UGX per semester and 2,000,000 UGX per year. Additionally, there are functional fees of 520,000 UGX per semester and 1,040,000 UGX per year for both programs.

What are the admission requirements for the Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology?

The admission requirements for the Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology are as follows:

1. Academic Qualifications:
   - Applicants must have completed the Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE) or its equivalent with at least two principal passes in Biology and Chemistry, and at least a subsidiary pass in Physics or Mathematics.

2. Additional Requirements:
   - Applicants must have obtained a minimum of a credit in English at the Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) or its equivalent.
   - Applicants must have a minimum of two years of working experience in

How can I contact the Office of Student Services at Mbarara University of Science and Technology?

To contact the Office of Student Services at Mbarara University of Science and Technology, you can use the following contact information:

- Phone: +256 772 400 000
- Email: studentservices@must.ac.ug
- Address: Office of Student Services, Mbarara University of Science and Technology, P.O. Box 1410, Mbarara, Uganda

You can reach out to them for any inquiries or assistance related to student services, including admissions, registration, student support, and more.

What is the fee structure for the Diploma in Science Laboratory Technology program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology?

The fee structure for the Diploma in Science Laboratory Technology program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology is as follows:

- Campus: Mbarara
- Duration: 2 years
- Tuition per semester: 567,000 UGX
- Functional Fees per semester: 540,000 UGX
- Tuition per year: 1,134,000 UGX
- Functional Fees per year: 1,080,000 UGX

Please note that these fees are subject to change, and it's always recommended to check with the university for the most up-to-date

What are the admission requirements for the Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology?

The admission requirements for the Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery program at Mbarara University of Science and Technology are as follows:

1. Academic Qualifications:
   - Applicants must have completed the Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education (UACE) or its equivalent with at least two principal passes in Biology and Chemistry, and at least a subsidiary pass in Physics or Mathematics.

2. Additional Requirements:
   - Applicants must have obtained a minimum of a credit in English at the Uganda Certificate of Education (UCE) or its equivalent.
   - Applicants must pass the university's entrance examination and interview.
